{% extends "templates/end_page.html" %} {% set namespaces = "cmoon::meta" %} {% set library_name = "Metaprogramming" %} {% set item_name = "type_list" %} {% set end_name = "is_unique" %} {% set templates = "" %} {% block content2 %} {{macros.overload_set([ " [[nodiscard]] static constexpr bool is_unique() noexcept; " ])}}

Returns true if all of Types... are not the same, returns false otherwise. Always true if sizeof...(Types) is 0.

{{macros.function_stats( [], "true if all of Types... are not the same, false otherwise.", "This function never throws exceptions", "Constant." )}} {{macros.example_code( " import cmoon.meta; int main() { using tl = cmoon::meta::type_list; using tl2 = cmoon::meta::type_list; static_assert(!tl::is_unique()); static_assert(tl2::is_unique()); } " )}} {% endblock %}
